div.h3: Learning opportunities remain a priority during the closure of school buildings. The USD 345 Continuous Learning Plan is in place to ensure students can stay engaged.
div.a: Learn More about Learning opportunities remain a priority during the closure of school buildings. The USD 345 Continuous Learning Plan is in place to ensure students can stay engaged.

div.h3: Seaman School District serves birth through 12th grade students and adult learners in Topeka, Kansas emphasizing student engagement, rigorous and relevant content, and personalized learning.
